analyzed: khros pa'i zhabs chen brdabs pas khams gsum gnon //

original: sdigs mdzub gnam du bsgrengs shing lha chen 'dul //
analyzed: sdigs mdzub gnam du bsgrengs shing lha chen 'dul //

original: ljags 'dril tshems chen gtsigs shing khrag gis myos //

original: gcer bu 'jigs byed dbang phyug chen po'i tshul //
analyzed: gcer bu 'jigs byed dbang phyug chen po'i tshul //

original: 'jigs byed ma he khros pa'i zhal gdangs shing //
analyzed: 'jigs byed ma he khros pa'i zhal gdangs shing //

original: zhal dgu 'bar bas srid pa zad par rngub //
analyzed: zhal dgu 'bar bas srid pa zad par rngub //
translated: With his nine blazing mouths, he devours existence.

original: 'gro ba sna tshogs 'dul ba'i phyag rgya 'bar //
analyzed: 'gro ba sna tshogs 'dul ba'i phyag rgya 'bar //

original: bdud bzhi gnon pa'i zhabs ni brkyang bskum gnas //
analyzed: bdud bzhi gnon pa'i zhabs ni brkyang bskum gnas //
translated: His legs are extended and contracted, trampling the four mƒÅras.

original: 'jigs byed chen po'i sku la rtag tu 'dud //
analyzed: 'jigs byed chen po'i sku la rtag tu 'dud //
translated: I am always devoted to the form of the great terrifying one.

original: dbu dgu 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas //
analyzed: dbu dgu 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas //
translated: From the ma·πá·∏çala of his nine blazing faces,

original: g-yas kyi zhal gsum bgrad pa ni //
analyzed: g-yas kyi zhal gsum bgrad pa ni //
translated: his three right faces are bared,

original: mthing ga dmar dang ser ba'i zhal //
analyzed: mthing ga dmar dang ser ba'i zhal //
translated: blue, red, and yellow.

original: g-yon gyi zhal gsum gdangs pa ni //
analyzed: g-yon gyi zhal gsum gdangs pa ni //
translated: The three faces on the left are gaping,

original: dkar dang dud ka @218b gnag pa'i zhal //
analyzed: dkar dang dud ka @218b gnag pa'i zhal //

original: dbus kyi zhal gsum 'bar ba ni //
analyzed: dbus kyi zhal gsum 'bar ba ni //
translated: The three faces in the middle are blazing,

original: khro dang chags dang zhi ba'i tshul //
analyzed: khro dang chags dang zhi ba'i tshul //
translated: With the manner of wrath, passion, and peace.

original: phyag rgya 'od zer 'bar ba las //
analyzed: phyag rgya 'od zer 'bar ba las //
translated: From the blazing light of the mudras,

original: g-yas kyi phyag mtshan bcu drug ni //
analyzed: g-yas kyi phyag mtshan bcu drug ni //
translated: The sixteen implements in the right hands

original: rdeg cing 'joms pas mtshon cha gdengs //
analyzed: rdeg cing 'joms pas mtshon cha gdengs //
translated: Are raised weapons that beat and destroy.

original: g-yon gyi phyag mtshan bcu drug ni //üîΩrol cing stobs pa'i mtshan mas mdzes //
analyzed: g-yon gyi phyag mtshan bcu drug ni // rol cing stobs pa'i mtshan mas mdzes //
translated: The sixteen implements in the left handsüîΩAre beautiful with the signs of playfulness and strength.

original: brjid rngam zhabs kyi tsham ngam las //
analyzed: brjid rngam zhabs kyi tsham ngam las //
translated: From the threatening feet,

original: g-yas kyi zhabs brgyad bskum pa ni //
analyzed: g-yas kyi zhabs brgyad bskum pa ni //
translated: The eight right feet are contracted,

original: dregs pa'i lha brgyad thabs kyis 'dul //
analyzed: dregs pa'i lha brgyad thabs kyis 'dul //
translated: Taming the eight arrogant gods with skillful means.

original: g-yon gyi zhabs brgyad brkyang ba ni //
analyzed: g-yon gyi zhabs brgyad brkyang ba ni //
translated: The eight left feet are extended,

original: dregs pa'i lha mo brgyad la rol //
analyzed: dregs pa'i lha mo brgyad la rol //
translated: Enjoying the eight arrogant goddesses.

original: 'dod chags chen po gdul ba'i phyir //
analyzed: 'dod chags chen po gdul ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to tame great desire,

original: rtag tu ling+ga rgyas pa'i tshul //
analyzed: rtag tu ling+ga rgyas pa'i tshul //
translated: The lingam is always erect.

original: drag po'i tshul gyis zhe sdang 'dul //
analyzed: drag po'i tshul gyis zhe sdang 'dul //
translated: Wrath tames anger;

original: 'dul sku khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'dul sku khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to you, the taming body.

original: dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas //üîΩbdud dang gshin rje thabs kyis 'dul //
analyzed: dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas // bdud dang gshin rje thabs kyis 'dul //
translated: In the mandala of the great charnel ground,üîΩYou tame demons and the Lord of Death through skillful means,

original: ma mo mkha' 'gro dbang du sdud //
analyzed: ma mo mkha' 'gro dbang du sdud //
translated: And bring the mamos and dakinis under control.

original: dbang sdud khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dbang sdud khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to you, the one who brings under control!

original: dbang phyug chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas //
analyzed: dbang phyug chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas //
translated: In the mandala of Mahesvara,üîΩYou gather the powerless through faith,

original: dbang med dad pas 'dus pa dang // ye shes sprul pa'i 'khor gyis bskor //
analyzed: dbang med dad pas 'dus pa dang // ye shes sprul pa'i 'khor gyis bskor //
translated: And are surrounded by a retinue of emanations of wisdom.

original: 'khor bcas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'khor bcas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to you, together with your retinue!

original: ye shes thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas //
analyzed: ye shes thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas //
translated: In the mandala of the wisdom mind,

original: ji lta bur ni sprul gyur kyang //
analyzed: ji lta bur ni sprul gyur kyang //
translated: However you emanate,

original: rnam dag dbyings las ma g-yos pa'i //
analyzed: rnam dag dbyings las ma g-yos pa'i //
translated: You do not move from the pure basic space of phenomena.

original: mnyam nyid sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: mnyam nyid sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the body of equality!
